controls.reset-markers-confirm: This will reset all markers to their default state (visible). Continue?
controls.backup-save-confirm:
This will download a backup copy of all your map settings.

The file will be saved as: __fileName__

Continue?
controls.backup-load-fail: Restore failed, please double-check your file
controls.backup-load-unsupported: The backup feature is not available because your browser does not support the HTML5 File API.

letter-from-home.label: Letter from Home
letter-from-home.desc: Letters from home give insights into the war for the family, friends and acquaintances of soldiers. These can be found in the environment and on the bodies of deceased soldiers.

letter-to-home.label: Letter to Home
letter-to-home.desc: Missives to family and acquaintances back home that haven't yet been sent. These can be found by searching bodies and the environment.

last-letter.label: Last Letter
last-letter.desc: Troops in World War Two were encouraged to write 'Last Letters' to their loved ones. These are discoverable on the bodies of dead soldiers.

misc-document.label: Misc. Document
misc-document.desc: Memoranda, official, letters, reports, diaries and even poems... Scattered throughout the environment and sometimes on the bodies of enemy troops are a wide variety of documents. Some of these will be vital in enabling you to complete your mission.

duty-roster.label: Duty Roster
duty-roster.desc: Finding a Duty Roster on an enemy Officer will tag all members of an enemy squad.

sniper-report.label: Sniper Report
sniper-report.desc: Enemy snipers always complete reports about their activities. Sometimes these reports will be on their bodies, sometimes nearby. These reports can give you invaluable insights into the minds of your enemies...

deadeye-target.label: Deadeye Target
deadeye-target.desc: Each map includes 3 Deadeye Targets that only the most accomplished sharpshooters can hit. Such deadly accuracy will earn you special rewards.

generator.label: Generator
generator.desc: Use these noisy machines to mask the sound of your shots.

objective-primary.label: Primary Objective
objective-primary.desc: Primary objectives must be met to complete the mission.

objective-optional.label: Optional Objective
objective-optional.desc: Optional objectives are... well, optional. Complete them to earn extra points.

objective-exit.label: Mission Exit
objective-exit.desc: Go here after completing all primary objectives to finish the mission.
